thread.title: Property has gone downhill
thread.title_full: Property has gone downhill - Review of Citadines Trafalgar Square London, London, England - TripAdvisor

author: Gary T
title: Property has gone downhill
text:
Could put up with the lack of prompt service and patched walls but there was no excuse for the mold around the tub. Homeless people are all around the property and become very vocal and aggressive after dark.
Room Tip: Street noise all night long. Vagrants all around the property. See more room tips
